live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39720.summary: Some customers in Flin Flon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39720.title: July 18 – Flin Flon | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
